 /* \u5982\u679C / \u524D\u540E\u7684\u503C\u90FD\u5B58\u5728\uFF0C\u90A3\u4E48 / \u524D\u9762\u7684\u503C\u8BBE\u7F6E\u5176\u6C34\u5E73\u534A\u5F84\uFF0C/ \u540E\u9762\u503C\u8BBE\u7F6E\u5176\u5782\u76F4\u534A\u5F84\uFF0C\u5982\u679C\u6CA1\u6709 / \uFF0C\u5219\u6C34\u5E73\u548C\u5782\u76F4\u534A\u5F84\u76F8\u7B49 */
 border-radius: 10px 15px 20px 30px / 20px 30px 10px 15px;

 /* \u4E0A\u9762\u5199\u6CD5\u7B49\u4EF7\u4E8E\u4E0B\u9762\u7684\u5199\u6CD5\uFF0C\u7B2C\u4E00\u4E2A\u503C\u662F\u6C34\u5E73\u534A\u5F84\uFF0C\u7B2C\u4E8C\u4E2A\u503C\u662F\u5782\u76F4\u534A\u5F84 */
 border-top-left-radius: 10px 20px;
 border-top-right-radius: 15px 30px;
 border-bottom-right-radius: 20px 10px;
 border-bottom-left-radius: 30px 15px;
}

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"css","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`/* \u5B9A\u4E49\u6B63\u5E38\u5B57\u4F53 */
@font-face{
  font-family: myFirstFont;
  src: url('/example/css3/Sansation_Light.ttf'),
       url('/example/css3/Sansation_Light.eot'); /* IE9+ */
}

/* \u5B9A\u4E49\u7C97\u4F53\u65F6\u4F7F\u7528\u7684\u5B57\u4F53 */
@font-face{
  font-family: myFirstFont;
  src: url('/example/css3/Sansation_Bold.ttf'),
       url('/example/css3/Sansation_Bold.eot'); /* IE9+ */
  /* \u6807\u8BC6\u5C5E\u6027 */
  font-weight:bold;
}

div{
  font-family:myFirstFont;
}

}

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"css","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`/* \u540C\u65F6\u5411\u5BBD\u5EA6\u3001\u9AD8\u5EA6\u548C\u8F6C\u6362\u6DFB\u52A0\u8FC7\u6E21\u6548\u679C */
div{
  transition: width 2s, height 2s, transform 2s;
  -moz-transition: width 2s, height 2s, -moz-transform 2s;
  -webkit-transition: width 2s, height 2s, -webkit-transform 2s;
  -o-transition: width 2s, height 2s,-o-transform 2s;
}

/* \u5F53\u9F20\u6807\u79FB\u4E0A\u65F6\u5BBD\u5EA6\u548C\u9AD8\u5EA6\u90FD\u53D8\u6210200px\uFF0C\u540C\u65F6\u65CB\u8F6C180\u5EA6\uFF0C\u6BCF\u4E2A\u5C5E\u6027\u53D8\u5316\u90FD\u8017\u65F62\u79D2 */
div:hover{
  width:200px;
  height:200px;
  transform:rotate(180deg);
  -moz-transform:rotate(180deg);        /* Firefox 4 */
  -webkit-transform:rotate(180deg);     /* Safari and Chrome */
  -o-transform:rotate(180deg);          /* Opera */
}

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"css","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`/* \u901A\u8FC7@keyframes \u521B\u5EFA\u52A8\u753B */
@keyframes myfirst{
  from {background: red;}
  to {background: yellow;}
}
/* Firefox */
@-moz-keyframes myfirst {
  from {background: red;}
  to {background: yellow;}
}
/* Safari \u548C Chrome */
@-webkit-keyframes myfirst {
  from {background: red;}
  to {background: yellow;}
}
/* Opera */
@-o-keyframes myfirst {
  from {background: red;}
  to {background: yellow;}
}

/*   \u5C06\u521B\u5EFA\u7684\u52A8\u753B\u7ED1\u5B9A\u5230\u9009\u62E9\u5668\uFF0C\u5E76\u81F3\u5C11\u6307\u5B9A\u4EE5\u4E0B\u4E24\u9879 CSS3 \u52A8\u753B\u5C5E\u6027   1.\u6307\u5B9A\u52A8\u753B\u7684\u540D\u79F0\uFF1B   2.\u6307\u5B9A\u52A8\u753B\u7684\u65F6\u957F\uFF1B*/
div{
  animation: myfirst 5s;
  -moz-animation: myfirst 5s;       /* Firefox */
  -webkit-animation: myfirst 5s;    /* Safari \u548C Chrome */
  -o-animation: myfirst 5s;         /* Opera */
}

div{
  animation: myfirst 5s linear 2s infinite alternate;
  /* Firefox: */
  -moz-animation: myfirst 5s linear 2s infinite alternate;
  /* Safari \u548C Chrome: */
  -webkit-animation: myfirst 5s linear 2s infinite alternate;
  /* Opera: */
  -o-animation: myfirst 5s linear 2s infinite alternate;
}
